Process:
- prepare app.R file
- deply the app with shinylive::export(appdir = "myapp", destdir = "docs")


#################################
output$downloadData <- downloadHandler(
  filename = function() {
    paste("calculation_result_", Sys.Date(), ".pdf", sep = "")
  },
  content = function(file) {
    # Path to the external R Markdown file (replace with the correct file path)
    reportFile <- "report_template.Rmd"

    # Parameters to pass to the markdown document
    params <- list(pH = input$pH, dry = input$dry, temp = input$temp, urea= input$urea,
                   n_target = input$n_target, va_vol = input$va_vol,
                   duration = result()$duration,
                   application =  result()$application,
                   land = result()$land
                   )

    # Copy the report file to a temporary location before rendering
    tempReport <- file.path(tempdir(), "tempReport.Rmd")
    file.copy(reportFile, tempReport, overwrite = TRUE)

    # Render the PDF with the parameters
    rmarkdown::render(tempReport, output_file = file, params = params, envir = new.env(parent = globalenv()))
  }
)
}
